author: arkurth
msg: Added call_post_load_custom() sub to Linux.pm. It checks if /etc/init.d/post_load_custom exists and executes it after an image is loaded. This allows an image creator to easily add a custom script which automatically executes on image load. This functionality already exists for Windows.
Added $NODE_CONFIGURATION_DIRECTORY class variable to Linux.pm to match Windows.pm.
Also added subroutine headers to Linux.pm where they were missing but did not populate the information.

author: digy
msg: Some more XML documentation clean up

author: trawick
msg: fix warnings for non-static functions without prototype
